amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would provide for the sale of Federal land to reduce the Federal deficit.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1024 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1024 proposed by Senator Heinrich. (consideration: CR S1983; text: CR S1983) To create a point of order against legislation that would provide for the sale of Federal land to reduce the Federal deficit.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1024 proposed by Senator Heinrich.
